scripts.make: bun run renew && bun run build
scripts.build: bun run document:build && bun run content:build && bun run desktop:build
scripts.update: bun run content:update && bun run document:update && bun run website:update && bun run mobile:update && bun run desktop:update
scripts.install: bun run content:install && bun run document:install && bun run website:install && bun run mobile:install && bun run desktop:install
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules && bun run content:clean && bun run document:clean && bun run website:clean && bun run mobile:clean && bun run desktop:clean
scripts.renew: bun run content:clean && bun run document:clean && bun run website:clean && bun run mobile:clean && bun run desktop:clean && bun run content:install && bun run document:install && bun run mobile:install && bun run desktop:install
scripts.website:dev: cd repository/website document && bun run dev
scripts.desktop:clean: cd repository/desktop && rimraf .next node_modules renderer/.next renderer/out app dist
scripts.desktop:post:update: cd repository/desktop && bun update --latest --silent --force && yarn add electron-serve@^1.3.0 electron-store@^8.2.0 && yarn add --dev electron@^34.0.0 electron-builder@^24.13.3 next@^14.2.4 nextron@^9.5.0 react@^18.3.1 react-dom@^18.3.1
scripts.mobile:clean: cd repository/mobile && rimraf android node_modules builds
scripts.mobile:update: cd repository/mobile && bun update --latest --silent --force && npx expo install --fix
scripts.mobile:build: bun run mobile:build:production && bun run mobile:build:distribution && bun run mobile:build:development
scripts.mobile:build:development: cd repository/mobile && npx expo prebuild --platform android && export NODE_ENV='development' && export ANDROID_HOME='/opt/android-sdk' && export ANDROID_SDK_ROOT='/opt/android-sdk' && export JAVA_HOME='/usr/lib/jvm/jdk-23.0.2-oracle-x64' && export ANDROID_NDK_HOME='/opt/android-sdk/ndk/28.0.13004108' && export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$ANDROID_HOME/cmdline-tools/tools/bin:$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools:$ANDROID_HOME/build-tools/35.0.1:$ANDROID_NDK_HOME:$PATH && cd repository/android && ./gradlew :app:assembleDebug --build-cache --configure-on-demand --no-daemon --max-workers=6 && mkdir -p ../builds && find ./app -name 'app-debug.apk' -exec mv {} ../builds/yt-dlx-1.0.0-development.apk \;
scripts.mobile:build:production: cd repository/mobile && npx expo prebuild --platform android && export NODE_ENV='production' && export ANDROID_HOME='/opt/android-sdk' && export ANDROID_SDK_ROOT='/opt/android-sdk' && export JAVA_HOME='/usr/lib/jvm/jdk-23.0.2-oracle-x64' && export ANDROID_NDK_HOME='/opt/android-sdk/ndk/28.0.13004108' && export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$ANDROID_HOME/cmdline-tools/tools/bin:$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools:$ANDROID_HOME/build-tools/35.0.1:$ANDROID_NDK_HOME:$PATH && cd repository/android && ./gradlew :app:bundleRelease --build-cache --configure-on-demand --no-daemon --max-workers=6 && mkdir -p ../builds && find ./app -name 'app-release.aab' -exec mv {} ../builds/yt-dlx-1.0.0-production.aab \;
scripts.mobile:build:distribution: cd repository/mobile && npx expo prebuild --platform android && export NODE_ENV='production' && export ANDROID_HOME='/opt/android-sdk' && export ANDROID_SDK_ROOT='/opt/android-sdk' && export JAVA_HOME='/usr/lib/jvm/jdk-23.0.2-oracle-x64' && export ANDROID_NDK_HOME='/opt/android-sdk/ndk/28.0.13004108' && export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$ANDROID_HOME/cmdline-tools/tools/bin:$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools:$ANDROID_HOME/build-tools/35.0.1:$ANDROID_NDK_HOME:$PATH && cd repository/android && ./gradlew :app:assembleRelease --build-cache --configure-on-demand --no-daemon --max-workers=6 && mkdir -p ../builds && find ./app -name 'app-release.apk' -exec mv {} ../builds/yt-dlx-1.0.0-distribution.apk \;
